The Aichemist Codex

A modern knowledge management system designed for researchers, data scientists, and curious minds.

Easy to Install and Use

pip install aichemist-codex
aichemist init

Get up and running in minutes with a simple installation process. The intuitive interface makes managing your knowledge base effortless.
